name: redux-subspace
description: Create isolated subspaces of a Redux store
author: Michael Peyper

scripts.test: lerna run test && npm run coverage
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build --timing; rm SUMMARY.md
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Publishing docs [ci skip]' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Publishing docs [ci skip]' && git push git@github.com:mpeyper/redux-subspace gh-pages --force
